Reference

All functions

bconf print(<bconf>)

Print current configurations

bjobs() bjobs_raw() brecent() bjobs_running() bjobs_pending() bjobs_done() bjobs_exit()

Summary of jobs

bjobs_reset_timestamp()

Clear job history

bkill()

Kill jobs

bsub_chunk() bsub_script() bsub_cmd()

Submit jobs

bsub_opt()

Parameters for bsub

config_bsub()

Configure bsub global options

job_dependency_all() job_dependency_igraph() job_dependency_dot() job_dependency_diagram()

Job dependencies

job_log()

Obtain Job log

job_status_by_name() job_status_by_id()

Job status by job ID or name

list_dump_files()

Check whether there are dump files

list_temp_files() remove_temp_files()

Clear temporary dir

monitor()

Browser-based interactive job monitor

print(<bjobs>)

Summary of jobs

random_job()

Submit a random job

job_rerun() pipeline_rerun()

Rerun jobs

retrieve_var()

Retrieve saved variable

run_cmd()

Run command on submission node

ssh_connect() ssh_disconnect()

Connect to submisstion via ssh

bjobs_barplot() bjobs_timeline()

Visualize statistics of jobs
